nodes.bodyText: Please, we are used to use the Logger - https://github.com/jbosstm/narayana/blob/master/ArjunaJTA/jta/classes/com/arjuna/ats/jta/logging/jtaI18NLogger.java#L50 to report the WARN and ERROR messages. We expect that e.g. the messages could be translated and tracked by id. Could you please make the message being defined there?
It could be better to use zero size array for toArray (toArray(new T[0])), see https://shipilev.net/blog/2016/arrays-wisdom-ancients/#_conclusion
A topic for discussion - would make sense to check for null the format and branch as well? Is there some experience that e.g. Oracle could not be filling the other parts of Xid and leaving them null?
A code style thing (not necessary to be addressed) - maybe the debug call message could be whole at single line.
If there is the check for globalTransactionId and branchQualifier in this printing, it could be good to check the format for null as well here.

nodes.bodyText: Would not be good to rename the arg0 to something more readable, e.g. xaResourceAsString?
It seems a strange indent is used here.
